item.title: Applying Design Thinking to a Pandemic
item.description: Everybody seems to have strong opinions about the best way to get out of the COVID-19 pandemic—to the point that makes it really tough to, indeed, get out. Maybe Design Thinking can help?

item.title: IOOI: Put Purpose to Work
item.description: We live in times of volatility, uncertainty, complexity, and ambiguity. Let’s take a closer look at a framework called IOOI that can help bring a sense of purpose to your work.

item.title: Card or Player: Who Wins Poker Games?
item.description: … and other counter-intuitive lessons from working 18 months on developing and executing SRGÂ SSR’s technology strategy.
